text: For were God to extend His provision to His servants to all of them they would all of them surely become covetous in other words they would become tyrants in the earth; but He sends down read yunzilu or yunazzilu of provisions in the measure that He will thus extending it for some of His servants to the exclusion of others â€” and from such extending of provision to some emerges tyranny. Surely He is Aware Seer of His servants.
